heading: Unsorted worries
subheading: Make the best use of your Worry Time by sorting your worry into one of these categories:

sections.label: Solvable
paragraphs: Worries that you can do something about include problems you can solve, things you can change & situations you have some control over.
These could be disagreements, deadlines, health issues, or the bills, there's always the bills…

sections.label: Unsolvable
paragraphs: Worries you can’t do something about because they are:
These could be disagreements, deadlines, health issues, or the bills, there's always the bills…
